body: No but they'd look similar. The foxes are slightly smaller, have a different model, and the arctic foxes would be whiter than wolves.
body_html: No but they'd look similar. The foxes are slightly smaller, have a different model, and the arctic foxes would be whiter than wolves.

post.title: So I made foxes actually look like they belong in Minecraft

body:
Honestly a lot of post 1.9 mobs look weird. Polar bears look like insects, the new horse model looks kind of weird, baby turtles look very weird, phantoms look lackluster, the fox model is beyond me, the strider and bee model is just lazy, and the new zombified piglin model doesn't have any layers.

Though I do like the cod, panda, and vex models.
body_html:
Honestly a lot of post 1.9 mobs look weird. Polar bears look like insects, the new horse model looks kind of weird, baby turtles look very weird, phantoms look lackluster, the fox model is beyond me, the strider and bee model is just lazy, and the new zombified piglin model doesn't have any layers.

Though I do like the cod, panda, and vex models.
